alert.note: Alert for Isle of Wight; Southampton; Suffolk; Surry; Sussex (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 4:02PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Isle of Wight, northeastern Southampton, northeastern Sussex and southeastern Surry Counties and the northeastern City of Suffolk through 445 PM EDT... At 402 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ivor to Isle Of Wight to near Crittenden. Movement was north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Newport News, Smithfield, Windsor, Waverly, Wakefield, Suffolk, Isle Of Wight, Ivor, Dendron, Rescue, Sedley, Crittenden, Elberon, Zuni, Driver, Vicksville, Rushmere, Booth Fork, Pons and Carrollton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Isle of Wight; Southampton; Suffolk; Surry; Sussex
